div.p:
In curia ballivorum tenta xijo die Januarij anno et cetera lxxv . Dauid matheson inuenit
Willelmum cadiou plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate thome mar aliter quam per viam Juris
Et andreas scherar' plegius legalis pro dicto thoma de indempnitate eiusdem thome ut supra
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xv die Januarij

quo die Nicolaus baxtar ex parte vxoris
sue posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro fractione communis ordinacionis in propinacione seruicij xij d' et ideo
amerciatur et emendabit ad visum consilij

Eodem die coram ballivis protribunali sedentibus Dauid galichtlie obligatur et fatebatur se
soluere Waltero achneif triginta nouem solidos in argento et non in dena
riatis ad festum beati martinj proximo futuro absque vlteriori dilacione

Dauid crukschank conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione iniusta henrici bawne et
emendabit dampnum prout Jura volunt

Item eodem die Dauid leslie vnus ballivorum obligatur ad satisfaciendum alexandro nachty
in medio quadragesime proximo venturo tres libras vsualis monete . uel duas
barellas salmonum ad festum beati Johannis baptiste nuncupatum mydsummir proximo et immediate
inde sequente . absque vlteriori dilacione pro quibus deuenit sibi debitor pro Dauid galychtly

Et eodem modo idem Dauid galichtly obligatur dicto Dauid lesly ballivo in tribus
libris dicte monete scocie uel in duabus barellis salmonum satisfaciend' ad dictos terminos

Thomas symson plegius legalis pro Dauid crukschank de indempnitate henrici bawne
et thome bawne fratris sui aliter quam per viam Juris Similiter gilbertus vaus plegius
pro dictis henrico et thoma

In curia ballivorum tenta xvj die Januarij Adam Walkar conuictus per
assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento per perturbacione et percussione thome skynnar et emen
dabit prout Jura volunt Et Dauid crukschank deuenit plegius legalis pro
adam Walkar de indempnitate dicti thome . et prefatus thomas inuenit thomam chavmer
plegium legalem de indempnitate dicti adam aliter quam per viam Juris
Willelmus blindsel senior plegius legalis pro thoma bawne de indempnitate adam Walkar

the same day It is ordanit be the bailyes and certane persons of the consel that for
the strublans that Dauy crukschank was conuict of henry bawne
vndir nycht . and for the strublans and hurting of thom skynnar done be
Adam Walkar It is deliuerit that for the amendis tharof the said Dauy
sal cum on sunday next tocum oute of the vestry of sanct Nicolace kirk
bare hede with a pund of walx in his hand in the tyme of the hie
mes with a lous' gowne / and ask the bailyes in the name of the toune
forgifnes of the offens done to the toune and offir the walx to the haly
blude lycht And that adam Walkar' for the offens that he has
done to the toune and the party . sal pas the said day aboute the pilla
ris of the kirk before the processione with a lous' gowne sark allane
barfute and bareleg and barehede with a candil of a pund of wax
and his knyf in his tothir hand / and offer the candil to the haly blude
lycht / and the knyfe to the balyes / and ask the balyes forgifnes in
the name of the towne and the party

Die vicesima Januarij Jacobus cummyn inuenit Dauid mathoson plegium legalem
pro eo de indempnitate andree scherar et Duncanj lammynton' ac suarum parcium aliter
quam Jura volunt et cetera

Memorandum quod xxiijo Januarij coram thoma fif / vno ballivorum Dauid crukschank
constituit Willelmum blindsel seniorem et thomam symson coniunctim et divisim suos procura
tores ad agendum et defendendum pro eo penes plegium quam eundem porrectum per
gilbertum morison . pro liberacione ipsius gilberti de ix li' et cetera Et promisit de Rato
cum ceteris procuratorij clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Die xxix Januarij predicti / andreas scherar' inuenit gilbertum vaus
plegium legalem de indempnitate Jacobi cummyn Et idem Jacobus dedit Dauid
mathoson plegium legalem quod dictus andreas erit indempnis aliter quam
per viam Juris

head.foreign: Copia littere Regis pro defensione Johannis ruthirfurd et cetera in p Rethis de Raik

div.p:
James be the grace of god king of scottis . To the aldirman and bailies of our burgh of aberdene
greting ffor samekil as our louit Johne stewart bastard has set til our louit Johne
ruthirfurd the fisching of half a net in the wattir of the Raik for certane yeris and ter
mis like as the lettres of the said Johne stewart made to the said Johne rudirfurd
tharupon proportis and beris / the quhilk fisching pertenit to vmquhile our louit Androw alan
son burges of our said burgh And now to the said Johne stewart bastard be reson
and caus' of our gift and donacion made be ws to him of the same Oure wil is her
for and we charge you straitly and commandis that ye supple mantene and defend the
said Johne ruthirfurd and all vthiris factouris procuratouris and malaris to the said
Johne ruthirfurd of the said fischingis or ony part tharof in the Joysing and brouking
of the same And that ye suffer nane vthiris personis intromet tharwith bot the procuratouris
and malaris forsaid And this on na wis' ye lefe vndone as ye wil ansuere
to ws heruppon And vndir al the hiest pain and charge that eftir may folou / the
quhilk to do we commit to you and ilkane of you coniunctlie and seueraly our full
power be thir our lettres . deliuering thaim be you sene and vndirstandin agane to
the berar Gevin vndir our signet at Edinburgh the xix day of Januar' And of
our Regne' the xvj yer'
per primum D N Regem
James R
Scheues

Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio quinto die februarij anno et cetera lxxv quo die
secta vocata et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

Eodem die petrus Kympty constabilarius comparens in iudicio coram ballivis . fecit
constituit et ordinavit andream Kympty suum procuratorem actorem factorem et deputatum
specialem in omnibus et singulis causis et loquelis placitis et querelis motis
sive monendis ipsum tangen' seu tangere valen' qualicumque prosequend' agend'
et defendend' pro ipso constituen' et nomine suo Et promisit de Rato cum ceteris procuratoribus
clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The same day in the actione movit beuix Alexander rede and Dauid methoson anent
ten pundis clamit be the said Dauid / the Assise deliueris that gif the
Abbot of Deir wil depone and swere the next tyme that he cumis
to this toune / that he has payit Johne mathosonnis dettis til the said
alexander rede and his wif /. than the said alexander rede is dettour til the said
Dauid for the said x li' / and gif he Refusis the aith / the said Alexander sal
assigne the said Abbot to pay him the said ten pundis

Item the said alexander rede grauntis him til haue ressauit of the person of gles
gowis obligacion xiij s' tobe pait within lachful day to the said David

Item the said day it was deliuerit be ane assise . that James nevy
son sal deliuer til Alexander scrogis ane half barel of salmond ful rede
and swete betuix this and Witsunda / the said alexander giffand him agane
iij s' . for twa laxis ressauit be him . For the quhilk half barel
Johne the vaus yungar is becumin borch til the said Alexander . tobe pait
be the said feist of Witsunda

Item the same day the actione movit betuix William blindsel and alexander
howison anent twa barellis of salmond clamit be the said William
the assise has deliuerit / that the said alexander sal preve with Johne
the vaus yungar / that the said William was content totak xl s' for
ane of the barellis of salmond' / and gif he falyeis in the said prufe tocontent
the said William for a barrel of salmond

And anent the tothir barel of salmond alexander trail has deponit / that the said alexander
sal bettir to the said William for xvij grils' quhilkis was in the barel
ressauit be the said William

The ix day of februar' the yer' et cetera lxxv yeris / the quhilk day ser Alexander
vokat chaplane comperit before the aldirman and the consale / and fand souertie
Dauid colison for ten merkis tobe furth cumand til the proffite and the avale of Ag
nes voket ane of the dochteris of vmquhile William voket / for the quhilk
ten merkis henry voket son and ayr til the said William with consent and assent of his ner
rest frendis Riply avisit has gevin heritabil state and possessione til the said
ser alexander of ane waist land liand in the schipraw . betuix the land of Alexander trail
on the southe part / and the land of Robert of vchterles on the north part / And the said
ser alexander sal sustene the said damicel quhil scho cum to profite age et cetera

Item the said day in like wise ser William voket chaplan in auld aberdene . has fundin
alexander trail souertie for ten merkis tobe furth cumand to the proffite of Alexander voket
ane of the sonnis of the said vmquhile William voket / and he tosustene him
quhil he cum to profite age

Item the said day comperand before the aldirman and consale . henry vokat son and ayr
til the forsaid William voket / and has fundin souertie his hand land and gude
for ten merkis tobe furth cumand to Androw voket brothir til the said henry quhat
tyme that he cumis toprofite age . And in the meyn tyme . he sal sustene the
said Androw vnto his profite age as said is

The same day comperand / Duncan of byrs on theta part and Johne androson on the tothir part
before the aldirman and balyeis sittand in Jugement contendand . apon ane annuel
of fourty penyis lia of a land liand in the schipraw / the quhilk land the said
Johne sauld purely and simply to the forsaid Duncan nocht makand mencione of the
said annual / and askit at the aldirman and balyeis be his forspekar Alexander
of chavmer of murchil . that the said Johne andirson suld warand him . of the said
annuel eftir the tenor of his chartir / the quhilk aldirman Balyes and consale Riply
avisit decretit and ordanit . that the said Johne andirson suld gif state and possession
til the said Duncan or til ser alexander voket in the name of the chaplanis of
Aberdene to quhom the said annuel pertenis of fourty pennyis of annuel of vthir
landis pertenand to the said Johne / ffor the quhilkis tobe done / the aldirman and
balyeis chargit alexander chavmer seriand tolay wand on him toremain in the
tolbuthe / quhil he fulfillit the forsaid decrete and ordinans et cetera

Die xija februarij anno et cetera lxxvto plegia porrecta per thomam mar prelocutorem thome
culan et Recontrariaciones per gilbertum vaus / cum consensu parcium Respectuantur propter debi
litatem curie vsque diem veneris videlicet xvj diem instantis mensis statu quo nunc absque
preiudicio ad tunc wardandum super eisdem
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xvj die februarij .

quo die Johannes mar betson
confessus fuit se debere dimediam barelle salmonum Rectori de owyn . pro qua
traxit Dauid mar in plegium et fideiussorem vnde thomas fiffe vnus ballivo
rum dedit seriando in mandatis ad precipiendum eundem Johannem satisfacere dictam dimidiam barelle
et ad obseruandum dictum Dauid indempnem de eadem penes dictum rectorem

the same day Alexander rede schew to the aldirman and balyeis . that he had strekit
ane borch in this maner' videlicet I alexander rede strekis ane borgh in your hand
alexander of chavmer ane of the seriandis that Johne androson and Dauid Kyntor
aucht tofre me of the half some' of ane obligacion . contenand ij li' g' and
x s' g' of the sowme of the half obligacion ./ becaus' that thai ar intromet
touris with the gudis of quhilum gilbert Kintor' and tutour to his son and ayr
And that thai aucht to fre me on the said gilbertis behalf be thir resonis and
vthir resones that I sal schaw / and wrangis for thai do it nocht / And
tharto a borgh in your hand alexander of chavmer ane of the offisaris forsaidis
the quhilk seriand warnit the forsaidis Johne and Dauid toansuer' to the said
borch before thare Jugez ordinar forsaid . sayand that thare ansuer' was
that the action of the said borch pertenit to the spirituale court / and that tharfor
thai wald nocht ansuer' tharto before the aldirman and balyeis forsaidis / Apon the
quhil ansuer' alexander rede askit witnes of the hail court et cetera

Item the said day . the aldirman and consel has Ressauit and admittit thom of mar to the
tak of ane half nettis fisching of the furdis apon the wattir of Dee . for the
termys of the last assedacion . made til quhilum William voket . the quhilk half
nettis fisching henry voket son and ayr til quhilum the said William his fadir and
assigna til him of the said fisching / Resignit in the handis of thomas fiffe ane of
the balyeis in fauour of the said thomas of mar' . Requirand the said balye tobeseke the
aldirman and consel forsaid on his behalf til admit the said thomas of mar to the
said half nettis fisching / quhil the termis fornemmyt be fullely complete and runnyn
To the quhilk thomas of mar' henry voket forsaid has gevin ouyr all rycht and clame
of rycht that he has had or may haue / to or of / the said fisching in tyme tocum
before thir witnez androw scherar' maistir alexander culan parson of owyn androw culan and
vtheris sindri

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xixo die februarij anno et cetera lxxv . quo die secta
vocata et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

div.head: Nomina Inquisicionis
div.p:
Alexander de camera de murchil . Johannes de mar' matheus fichet Dauid colison David
symson Johannes androson thomas de camera gilbertus chavmer gilbertus vaus
thomas culan Dauid mathoson thomas prat alexander rede Willelmus hay gilbertus
morison Johannes glenmalvyn Johannes stewart alexander trail Johannes Wormot

The xxiij day of februar' the yer' et cetera lxxv . It was deliuerit be ane sworn
assise anent the actione movit be thomas of mar againnis thomas symson of
foure hambir barellis of salmond . send in mawnus Wormotis schip in Ingland
that the said thomas symson sal deliuer ful compt rekning and payment to the
said thomas of mar of the said foure barellis of salmond . becaus' the said
thomas entromettit with thame . Item that the said thomas symson sal gif compt
rekning and payment til gilbert vaus of a barel of salmond / Item the said
thomas symson sal gif compt and rekning and payment of twa barellis of
salmond til patrik talyour and til moris' his brothir

The last day of februar' the yer' et cetera lxxv . Alexander of menyes aldirman in presence of
the counsale become souertie til Johne Wode in the name and on the behalue
of androw Wode his son' . that the proffite of the fisching of ane half net of
the Raik the quhilk quhilum androw alanson had in assedacione of this towne
salbe furthcumand . til androw Wode or til Dauid lesly . quhilk of thaim is
fundyn . tohaue right to the said tak

The first day of marche the yer' aboue writin . Comperit before the aldirman
and bailleis sittand in Jugement in presence of the counsale Dauid colison schav
and to thaim . that William bonar' had set til him in tak and assedacione ane
half nettis fisching of the Raik eftir the tenour of the said Williamis lettre made
til him tharupon / askand at the aldirman and bailyeis that he mycht bruke his
said tak eftir the fourme of the assedacion . made til him /. And incontinent
Dauid lesly ane of the bailleis allegeit that he had tak of the
said half nettis fisching of the Raik of the said William bonar' with
the quhilk he said he wauld Remain with the perel of law

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurd extraxit per manum suam terras suas et bona
sua in plegium legalem pro se alexandro menyes preposito et thome fif vni ballivorum . quod
Dauid lesly erit indempnis de eo aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodem modo Dauid
lesly / inuenit andream branche plegium legalem pro ipso de indempnitate dicti
Johannis aliter quam Jura volunt . Testibus Johanne vaus Johanne Wormot thoma
de mar' andrea culan et Waltero Rolland cum diuersis aliis Acta erant hec hora
vta uel eacirca post merediem

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio secundo die marcij anno et cetera lxxv . Matheus cowpar conuictus
per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta thome mar' extrahendo sibi cultellum
et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt . Et in partem emende assisa ordinavit eundem
matheum ad dandum et deliberandum duas libras cere ad lumen sancti sanguinis
ad voluntatem prepositi

Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio quarta die marcij anno predicto / quo die secta vocata
et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

div.head: Inquisicio
div.p:
Johannes de Knollis Johannes Wode Dauid colison Dauid symson alexander de camera
gilbertus chavmer thomas de camera Dauid mathoson Johannes Wormot thomas mar'
thomas prat Jacobus craik gilbertus leche Johannes stewart et Robertus prat Qui
iurati dicunt quod quondam Edana tulch mater Andree smyth latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestita
et sasita ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de vna terra cum pertinenciis iacente
in vico de le futy inter terram quondam andree spryng ex parte australi ex parte vna et
terram quondam Johannis de tulch ex parte boreali ex parte altera infra libertatem dicti burgi Et quod
dictus andreas est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Edane matris sue de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis et est legittime etatis / Et quod valet nunc per annum decem solidos et tantum
tempore pacis Reddito inde annuatim altari beate Katherine virginis situati in ecclesia parrochiali beati
nicholai septem denarios et quinque denarios pro firma regia Et quod tenetur de
domino nostro rege in libero burgagio Et quod nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis per mortem
dicte Edane que obiit in mense Septembris vltimo elapso in defectu legittimi heredis
Jus suum minime prosequentis

the same day anent the twa hamburgh barellis of salmond clamit be gilbert
vaus fra Johne fichet / the said assise deliuerit that Johne fichet sal deliuer
ful compt rekning and payment to the said gilbert vaus of the said twa
barellis of salmond et cetera

The same day comperit before the aldirman balyeis and consale sittand in
Jugement . Alexander rede . and fand souertie . Androw moir Richard of culan alexander
naghty Wat of achneif gilbert leche Wil moir yungar and Dauid gethan
burges of this burgh . for thre score of markis and ten merkis of vsuale money
of scotland tobe furth cumand til the proffite and the avale of Anny mathoson
ane of the dochtiris of vmquhile Johne mathoson at hir age of twelf
yeris and failyeand of his til the nerrest ayris and frendis that may succede
and pertene til hir of resone

Item the said day alexander menyes aldirman and alexander chavmer of murchil admiral deputis
chargit Dauid blabre / mawnus Wormot and Johne fichet tobe redy with thar'
schippes topas with the admiral in the kingis seruice the xxij day of aprile
next tocum / The quhilk todo thai haue fundyn souertee thare handis landis
and gudis in presence of the hail court

Eodem die post merediem Alanus smyth dedit Roberto blindsel vnj ballivorum
Dauid mathoson plegium legalem de indempnitate andree smyth aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Robertus burnet plegius legalis pro dicto andrea ut supra

Die quinta marcij Thomas gardnar' et Willelmus sprunt conuicti per assisam ipsorum
quilibet amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem et emendabit alter altri prout Jura volunt

Die octaua mensis marcij . coram Jacobo cummyn vno ballivorum protribunali sedentibus
Willelmus modan concessus fuit se debere Johanni Wormot tres libras
et xiiij s' termino solucionis preterito / et aban' per eundem a quindena et vltra
coram officialis confessatus . vnde Duncanus stralogh seriandus de mandato
dicti ballivi precipiebat prefatum Willelmum quod non recederet de pretorio quousque satis
faceret predicto Johanni de summa prenotata / Insuper appunctuatum et concordatum
est inter dictas partes ut sequitur videlicet dictus Willelmus modan obligatur in
Judicio ad satisfaciendum Johanni Wormot duas hamburgh barellas salmonum et xiiij s'
pro summa prescripta vna cum tercia barella salmonum mensure hamburgie
eidem Johannis per ipsum Willelmum debit' de termino transacto ad festum beati
Johannis baptiste nuncupatum mydsummir proximo futuro absque vlteriori dilacione

Item eodem die Robertus burnet conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione alexandri
chavmer seriandi suum officium ministrantis / et emendabit ad visum
prepositi et consilij

the same day in the actione movit be Dauid menyes againnis peter rait francheman
anent ane certane some' clamit be the said Dauy for his labouris and expensis
made be him in the furthiring of the said peter et cetera the assise deliuerit that the said
Dauid has tane topreve within lachful tyme be suffisant certificacione and wit
nessing that george fisch . burges of Edinburgh promyst and was oblist til him
in the name and on the behalf of the said peter his gest for the tyme as forspe
kar for him / til content and assithe the said Dauid for his labouris and expensis
at the avise and sycht of a Reuerend fadir the bischop of orkna and of maistir Johne
of chavmer et cetera

And Johne of Knollis oist and forspekar til the forsaid peter is becumin souertie for him
tocontent and assithe Dauid menyes it that he may lachfully optene
apon the said peter anent his clame forsaid / sa that it be fundin be the law
gif the said peter considerand that he is a stranger' and apon his viage a
travalour suld fynd sik souertie et cetera

Item eodem die coram Jacobo cummyn vno ballivorum Adam de Knollis constituit
procuratores suos honorabilem virum Johannem de Knollis fratrem suum Johannem moir
et marcum scot coniunctim et divisim ad prosequendum thomam campsy super iniusta deten
cione vnius zone argentie ab eodem et ad agendum et defendendum pro eo
et nomine suo pro recuperacione eiusdem Et promisit de rato cum ceteris clausulis et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xjo die marcij anno et cetera lxxv /

quo die Andreas Wrycht
conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione iniusta domini andree Wrycht capellani in verbo
et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum / et prosequebatur eundem dominum adam ad domum suam
ex precogitata malicia et cetera

In curia legali tenta in pretorio xviijo die marcij anno predicto Johannes gregorij adiudicabatur
in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super quendam patricium rure manentem de iniusta detencione
certorum pellium ab ipso / eo quod idem patricius purgauit se vna cum filio suo per Juramenta
sua ex deliberacione assise de dicto clameo

vicesima quinta die marcij anno et cetera / lxxvjto coram thoma fif vno ballivorum thomas symson constitu
it Willelmum blindsel seniorem et Willelmum blinschel iuniorem ac thomam mar coniunctim et divisim suos
procuratores ad agendum et defendendum pro eo in omnibus actionibus et causis motis seu monendis inter
ipsum constituen' . et Andream branche Et promisit de Rato cum ceteris procuratorij
clausulis necessariis et oportunis / presentibus Dauid menyes Willelmo cadiou et aliis
